system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.X1Qj8vIUDMDE4iQ9]{Autofire Proficiency}

Benefit

When making an autofire attack, the character can choose an area of any four 5’ squares as long as they are connected. The character gains a +2 attack bonus when performing sweepfire attacks.

Normal

An autofire attack can only be used on a 10’ by 10’ area

Special

A character can only strafe a weapon with autofire, not bumpfire.
system.summary: Strafe autofire attacks, +2 to-hit with sweepfire
